ticket: Hello, I would like to stay home the 2nd of August for a medical consultation. Is it possible?
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear Amelie, I would like to take a vacation day the next Monday for a visit to the hospital, could you handle it? Thank you in advance
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear Mark, tomorrow I cannot come to work because I don't feel too well, can I take the day off?
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Hi, I would like to take two days off the first week of Avril. Best regards, John
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear Sir/Madame, I am positive to COVID and I cannot come to work for the next days. I don't exactly know when I will be able to return to work. Aaron
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: I want to take the day off on the first day of next week for an heart operation . If it is an issue please let me know, Fred
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Could I stay at home next Monday? I have a visit to the doctor that I cannot reschedule. Can this create any problem to anyone in the office?
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear Sir/Madame, next week I have an operation at the hospital so I won't be able to come to the office form Monday to Thursday. Thanks in advance for taking care of my request, Matthew
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear Anne, I would like to have the day off on the 10/10/2021 for medical reasons. Best regards, Gabriel
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: I cannot come to work tomorrow because yesterday I had an accident and right now I am at the hospital. I feel well, but I would like to take at least two days off. Best regards, Thomas
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear Madame, I would like to take the morning off on the 03/05 for a dental visit, could you take care of the request? Thanks very much, Mark
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear Mark, I believe that I deserve a salary raise for how many hours I'm working each week
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: I think I well earned an increase of salary of atleast the 10% because of my loyalty to the company. Best regards, Max
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Hello, I'm writing this mail to request a pay raise of 8% due to the uprising inflation over the last few months
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear William, I think my salary is a little bit lower compared to the industry standard. Could we set up a meeting to talk about this?
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Hi Charles, during the last few months my responsibilities have been increasing, but my salary is still the same as when I joined the company. If it remain the same I could start looking out for different options...
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear Kevin, I'd like a wage raise to $50,000 gross, which I think has been due for a lot of time
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear George, could you put a good word during the annual meeting about the salary raise we discussed last week? Thanks, Pam
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: I believe that I'm not earning what I deserve and if the situation does not change I could leave the company very soon
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear Patrick, I write this email to officially request a raise of at least the 20% not negotiable
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Hello, I want the wage increase which was promised to me before the start of next semester. I know the company can afford it, and I know that new hires receive almost the same compensation as me. Let me know, Noah
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear Mark, I've just discovered that John has an higher salary than mine even if we have the same responsibilities. Could I receive an explanation?
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Dear HR, after an anonymous poll we discovered that male collegues are in average paid the 15% more than their female counterparts. This is unacceptable!
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Why females are paid considerably less than males in our office? If this situation isn't solved by next month I will officially report it
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Can you explain why I'm being paid less than Ralph? I sincerly cannot understand the reasoning behind this decision
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: I discovered that there is a considerably large gender wage gap in our office and this is outrageous in 2020!
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Dear Sir, I noticed looking at George's paycheck that he is being given more bonuses than me. Could I have an explanation?
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Hi, I discovered that my male collegues are paid more than me and this is an unfair situation which can lead to legal consequences
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: I want to make it known that my male colleagues have been given more benefits than me, withhout any particular reason
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Can I know why Colin is paid the 5% more than me? Best regards, Julie
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Dear Sir/Madame, I'd like to take a vacation from the 20th of July to the 2nd of August. Is there any problem? Best regards, Frank
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Is it a problem if I take the next week off? It has been a while since I haven't been on vacation, so I hope this won't create any problem to the team. Thomas
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear George, yesterday one of close relatives passed away and this morning there is the funeral, so I would like to take today off. I hope you understand, Joffrey
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear Sir/Madame, next week there is the gruaduation of my son on Wednesday, so I would like to take thaday off. Best regards, Patrick
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear Anne, I recently divorced from my husband and I would like to take some time off to straighten my head. I accumulated many vacation days so it shouldn't be an issue. Kind regards, Laura
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Hello, This night there has been an attempted robbery at my house, and I have to go to the police this morning. I hope it is not a problem if today I don,t come to the office, Julian
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear Madame, during this period I'm moving house and it's taking more time than expected. Can I take tomorrow off?
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear Sir, next week on the 20/10/2022 I have an university exam so I won't be able to come to work. I hope it's not an issue. Thanks in advance, Sophia
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear John, recently a close friend passed away and I am not feeling really good mentally. I would like to take some days off if there aren't any issues
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear Raymond, this week I am reuniting with my family after a long time, so I would like to take tomorrow and the day after as vacation days. Best regards, Addison
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear HR, Jason has been doing comments about my religion that makes me uncomfortable. Could you have a talk with him?
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Emma, I am fed up with Jeffrey, he is creating a toxic work environment
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Jerry, I would like to discuss with someone about the roles problem that there is in the office right now. It is impossible to understand each others duties without well defined roles and it's not a new problem
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear HR, i want to report a racist accident in which my supervisor was involved. I don't want to be too specific before any investigation is done, but I hope there will be some repercussions
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Madame, I want to report that Mark has used a derogatory term talking about me. If you need it,I have proofs
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Sir, I cannot believe that I cannot come to work because of my disability. I believe that the company should be more concerned about the issues that people in my condition can face. Best, Caroline
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Tyler, I think that in the office older people are discriminated because of our age by some young people. They don't include us during reunions and they don't share any info with us
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Janet, I want to report that yesterday, during the company's event I was touched without my consent by a company's director. I expect that this person will be fired, there isn't any other possible end to this story. Hannah
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Sir, today I saw a collegue with some substance that could be illegal, what do you suggest I do? Who I should report this to?
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Hello, lately I heard some collegues making fun of me because of my accent and nationality. This isn't what I expected from this company
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Hello, when will I receive the $848 for the flight?

ticket: Hi, I would like to receive the money I'm owed for the hotel accommodation and the travel before next week. Best, Brittney

ticket: Dear Amber, I took a plane for a company's event on the 02/10/2022, I would like to be refunded if possible

ticket: Helloo, can I have a refund for the ticket from Paris to Marseille?
label: Refund_Refund travel

ticket: Dear Sir, I will move to the new office the next month, but I still havent't been able to find an accommodation. Do you hav any advice?

ticket: Dear Madame, I cannot find a place to saty for our transfert. Could you book me an hotel? The location is irrelevant for me

ticket: Dear Sir, could you help me finding accommodations in Nice for the period July - September

ticket: Dear Logan, I need somewhere to live for the period April-June 2018. Do you have any suggestions

ticket: Dear HR, do you provide any accommodations with the contract? If yes, is it included in the salary or is it deducted from it?

ticket: Dear Roy, what are the best websites to find a safe location where to live? Best, Danielle

ticket: Dear Sir/Madame, could you tell me which are the best hotels in the city center of Brussels?
